description:
A cap to shelter you from sun and light rain. And it has a secret! It stuffs into a hidden compartment in the crown so you can store it in your pocket or top of your pack.

  • Made from recycled nylon fabric that has UPF 50+ sun protection and a DWR finish
  • Soft recycled polyester sweatband keeps sweat out of your eyes
  • Foam brim is packable yet holds its shape to shade you from the sun
  • Stuffs into hidden pack-away pocket in crown
name: MEC Pack Away Sun Cap - Unisex
